abilities.name: Black Crusaders
abilities.rule:
- Each time a Combat Attrition test is taken for a unit with this trait, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that Combat Attrition test.
 - Each time a model with this trait makes an attack, add 1 to that attack's hit roll if:

 - That attack is a ranged attack and the target was the closest eligible enemy unit to the attacking model when its unit was selected to shoot.
 - That attack is a melee attack and the attacking model's unit made a charge move this turn.

traits.name: Veteran Raider
traits.rule: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly BLACK LEGION CORE or BLACK LEGION CHARACTER unit within 6" of this WARLORD. Until the end of the turn, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

traits.name: Indomitable
traits.rule: Each time an attack is allocated to this WARLORD, halve the Damage characteristic of that attack (rounding up).

traits.name: Merciless Overseer
traits.rule: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly BLACK LEGION unit within 6" of this WARLORD. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, if your army is engaged in either Wanton Destruction or Wanton Slaughter, that unit is considered to be engaged in Wanton Massacre for that attack instead (pg 145).

traits.name: Soul-Eater
traits.rule:
- Each time this WARLORD makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the wound roll.
 - Each time this WARLORD fights, after it has finished making its attacks, if one or more enemy models were destroyed by those attacks, this WARLORD regains up to D3 lost wounds.

traits.name: Trusted War-Leader
traits.rule: While this WARLORD is on the battlefield, each time you spend a Command point to use a Stratagem you can roll one D6: on a 5+, that Command point is refunded.

traits.name: Paragon of Hatred
traits.rule:
- You can re-roll charge rolls, made for this WARLORD.
 - Each time this WARLORD fights, if it is within Engagement Range of any enemy units, then until that fight is resolved, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this WARLORD (if any of those enemy units have the IMPERIUM keyword, add D3 instead of 1).

abilities.name: Profane Zeal
abilities.rule:
- Each time a model with this trait makes a melee attack, if that model's unit made a charge move, was charged or performed a Heroic Intervention this turn, you can re-roll that attack's hit roll.
 - Each time a model with this trait would lose a wound as the result of a mortal wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Terror Tactics
abilities.rule:
- Units with this trait have the following ability: 'Terror Tactics (Aura): While an enemy unit is within 9" of this unit, subtract 2 from the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit and subtract 1 from Combat Attrition tests taken for that unit.'
 - Each time a model with this trait makes an attack with a melee weapon, if that attack targets a unit that was below Half-strength when the attacking unit was selected to fight, or if that attack targets a unit that has a Leadership characteristic of 5 or less, add 1 to that attack's wound roll.

abilities.name: Iron Within, Iron Without
abilities.rule:
- Each time a model with this trait makes an attack, the target does not receive the benefits of cover against that attack.
 - Each time an attack is allocated to a model with this trait, if that Attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -1 or -2, the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack is worsened by 1.

abilities.name: Masters of Duplicity
abilities.rule:
- Each time a ranged attack targets a unit with this trait, if the attacker is more than 12" away, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll (if the target unit contains any models with a Wounds characteristic of 10 or more, the attacker must be more than 18" away instead for this benefit to apply).
 - Units with this trait are eligible to perform an action or declare a charge in a turn in which they Fell Back. If a unit with this trait declares a charge while it is performing an action, that action is still failed.

abilities.name: Flawless Perfection
abilities.rule:
- Each time a model with this trait makes an attack, you can ignore any or all hit roll, Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill modifiers.
 - Each time a model with this trait makes an attack, on an unmodified wound roll of 6, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Raiders from the Maelstrom
abilities.rule:
- Units with this trait are eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which they Advanced.
 - Models with this trait count as two models when determining control of an objective marker, or 5 models if they have a Wounds characteristic of 10 or more.

abilities.name: Experimental Enhancements
abilities.rule:
- Add 1" to the Move characteristic of models with this trait and add 1 to the Strength characteristic of models with this trait.
 - Each time a model with this trait is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making attacks, if any of the destroyed model's characteristics change as it suffers damage, for the purposes of determining what characteristics on its profile to use, the destroyed model is considered to have 1 wound remaining.

traits.name: Veteran Raider
traits.rule: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly BLACK LEGION CORE or BLACK LEGION CHARACTER unit within 6" of this WARLORD. Until the end of the turn, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

traits.name: Indomitable
traits.rule: Each time an attack is allocated to this WARLORD, halve the Damage characteristic of that attack (rounding up).

traits.name: Merciless Overseer
traits.rule: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly BLACK LEGION unit within 6" of this WARLORD. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, if your army is engaged in either Wanton Destruction or Wanton Slaughter, that unit is considered to be engaged in Wanton Massacre for that attack instead (pg 145).

traits.name: Soul-Eater
traits.rule:
- Each time this WARLORD makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the wound roll.
 - Each time this WARLORD fights, after it has finished making its attacks, if one or more enemy models were destroyed by those attacks, this WARLORD regains up to D3 lost wounds.

traits.name: Trusted War-Leader
traits.rule: While this WARLORD is on the battlefield, each time you spend a Command point to use a Stratagem you can roll one D6: on a 5+, that Command point is refunded.

traits.name: Paragon of Hatred
traits.rule:
- You can re-roll charge rolls, made for this WARLORD.
 - Each time this WARLORD fights, if it is within Engagement Range of any enemy units, then until that fight is resolved, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this WARLORD (if any of those enemy units have the IMPERIUM keyword, add D3 instead of 1).

wargear.name: Chaos Icon
wargear.rule: The bearer's unit gains the ICON keyword. Each time a Combat Attrition test is taken for the bearer's unit, add 1 to that Combat Attrition test.

wargear.name: Wings
wargear.rule: The bearer has a Move characteristic of 12" and the FLY keyword.

wargear.name: Chaos Familiar
wargear.rule: Once per battle, you can re-roll one Psychic test taken for this model.

wargear.name: Icon of Slaanesh
wargear.rule: The bearer's unit gains the ICON keyword. Each time a Combat Attrition test is taken for the bearer's unit, ignore any or all modifiers to that Combat Attrition test. Each time a model in the bearer's unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to that attack's hit roll.

wargear.name: Vindicator Siege Shield
wargear.rule: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to the bearer, add 1 to any armour saving throw made against that attack.

units.name: Abaddon the Despoiler
units.description: Abaddon the Despoiler is equipped with: Drach'nyen, Talon of Horus. Your army can only include one ABADDON THE DESPOILER model.

abilities.name: Let the Galaxy Burn, Warp Strike

units.name: Haarken Worldclaimer
units.description: Haarken Worldclaimer is equipped with: Helspear; Herald's Talon; frag grenades; krak grenades. Your army can only include one HAARKEN WORLDCLAIMER model.

abilities.name: Let the Galaxy Burn, Warp Strike

units.name: Huron Blackheart
units.description: Huron Blackheart is equipped with: Tyrant's Claw; exalted power axe; frag grenades; krak grenades. Your army can only include one HURON BLACKHEART model.

units.name: Heretic Astartes Daemon Prince
units.description: A Heretic Astartes Daemon Prince is equipped with: hellforged sword; malefic talons.

otherWargear.rule: The bearer has a Move characteristic of 12" and the FLY keyword.

wargearOptions: This model's hellforged sword can be replaced with one of the following: 1 daemonic axe; 1 malefic talons.
This model can be equipped with 1 wings (Power Rating +2).
units.psyker: If this mode has the TZEENTCH, NURGLE, or SLAANESH keyword, it has the PSYKER keyword. If this model is a PSYKER it can attempt to manifest one psychic power in your Psychic phase, and attempt to deny one psychic power in your opponent's Psychic phase. Such a model knows Smite and one psychic power from the Dark Hereticus discipline (pg 118). If this model has the TZEENTCH keyword, it also knows Skeins of Fate (pg 118). If this model has the NURGLE keyword, it also knows Putrid Miasma (pg 118). If this model has the SLAANESH keyword, it also knows Delightful Agonies

units.name: Fabius Bile
units.description: Fabius Bile is equipped with: Xyclos Needler; Chirurgeon; Rod of Torment; frag grenades; krak grenades. A Surgeon Acolyte is equipped with: close combat weapon. Your army can only include one FABIUS BILE unit.

units.name: Cypher
units.description: Cypher is equipped with: Cypher's bolt pistol; Cypher's plasma pistol; frag grenades; krak grenades. Your army can only include one CYPHER model.

units.name: Master of Possession
units.description: A Master of Possession is equipped with: bolt pistol; staff of possession; frag grenades; krak grenades.
units.psyker: This model can attempt to manifest two psychic powers in your Psychic phase and attempt to deny one psychic power in your opponent's Psychic phase. It knows Smite and two psychic powers from the Malefic discipline (pg 119).

units.name: Chaos Lord
units.description: A Chaos Lord is equipped with: plasma pistol; thunder hammer; frag grenades; krak grenades.
wargearOptions: This model's thunder hammer can be replaced with 1 weapon from the Melee Weapons list (pg 176)
This model's plasma pistol can be replaced with 1 of the following: 1 bolt pistol; 1 weapon from the Melee Weapons list.

units.name: Dark Apostle
units.description: A Dark Apostle is equipped with: bolt pistol; accursed crozius; frag grenades; krak grenades. Each Dark Disciple is equipped with: close combat weapon.
units.priest: This unit's DARK APOSTLE model knows Dark Zealotry and one other prayer from the Prayers to the Dark Gods. In your Command phase, this unit's DARK APOSTLE model can attempt to chant one prayer it knows that has not already been attempted by a friendly model this turn. Roll one D6: on a 3+, the prayer is heard and takes effect until the start of your next Command phase. Each time a prayer chanted by this unit's DARK APOSTLE model is heard, measure distances and draw line of sight from that DARK APOSTLE model.

units.name: Exalted Champion
units.description: An Exalted Champion is equipped with: bolt pistol; combi-melta; exalted power axe; frag grenades; krak grenades.

abilities.name: Let the Galaxy Burn, Malicious Volleys

units.name: Dark Commune
units.description: A Cult Demagogue is equipped with: autopistol; Commune stave. A Mindwitch is equipped with: close combat weapon. An Iconarch is equipped with: autopistol. Each Blessed Blade is equipped with: Commune blade. Every model is equipped with: frag grenades; krak grenades.
units.priest: This unit's CULT DEMAGOGUE model knows Dark Zealotry and one other prayer from the Prayers to the Dark Gods. In your Command phase, if that CULT DEMAGOGUE model is on the battlefield, it can attempt to chant one prayer it knows that has not already been attempted by a friendly model this turn. Roll one D6: on a 3+, the prayer is heard and takes effect until the start of your next Command phase. Each time a prayer chanted by this unit's CULT DEMAGOGUE model is heard, measure distances and draw line of sight from that CULT DEMAGOGUE model.
units.psyker: This unit's MINDWITCH model can attempt to manifest one psychic power in your Psychic phase and attempt to deny one psychic power in your opponent's Psychic phase. It knows Smite and one psychic power from the Dark Hereticus discipline. Each time this unit's MINDWITCH model attempts to Deny the Witch, manifest a psychic power or perform a psychic action, measure distances and draw line of sight from that MINDWITCH model. If enemy units have any abilities that require measuring distance or drawing line of sight to PSYKER units, do so to this unit's MINDWITCH model.

units.name: Legionaries
units.description: If this unit contains 6 or more models, it has Power Rating 12. Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; frag grenades; krak grenades.
wargearOptions: The Aspiring Champion's boltgun can be replaced with one of the following: 1 daemon blade; 1 plasma pistol (maximum 1 per model); 1 weapon from the Melee Weapons list (pg 176).
The Aspiring Champion's bolt pistol can be replaced with one of the following: 1 plasma pistol (maximum 1 per model); 1 weapon from the Melee Weapons list.
One model can be equipped with 1 Chaos icon.
Any number of Legionaries can each have their boltgun replaced with 1 Astartes chainsword.
One Legionary's boltgun can be replaced with 1 heavy chainaxe.
One Legionary's boltgun can be replaced with 1 balefire tome.

For every 5 models in this unit, one Legionary's boltgun can be replaced with one of the following: 1 plasma pistol; 1 weapon from the Special Weapons list; 1 weapon from the Heavy Weapons list*.

* You cannot select the same Special Weapon or Heavy Weapon more than once per unit.

abilities.name: Let the Galaxy Burn, Malicious Volleys

units.psyker: While this unit contains a model equipped with a balefire tome, this unit has the PSYKER keyword and can attempt to manifest one psychic power in your Psychic phase and attempt to deny one psychic power in your opponent's Psychic phase. It knows Smite and one psychic power from the Dark Hereticus discipline. Each time this unit attempts to Deny the Witch, manifest a psychic power or perform a psychic action, measure distances and draw line of sight from the model in this unit equipped with a balefire tome. If enemy units have any abilities that require distances to be measured or line of sight to be drawn to PSYKER units, do so to the model in this unit equipped with a balefire tome.

units.name: Cultists Mob
units.description: If this unit contains 11-20 models, it has Power Rating 5. Every model is equipped with: autopistol; brutal assault weapon; frag grenades; krak grenades.
wargearOptions: Any number of models can each have their autopistol and brutal assault weapon replaced with 1 Cultist firearm.
1 Chaos Cultist's autopistol and brutal assault weapon can be replaced with 1 flamer.
1 Chaos Cultist's autopistol and brutal assault weapon can be replaced with 1 heavy stubber
1 Chaos Cultist's autopistol and brutal assault weapon can be replaced with 1 Cultist grenade launcher
The Cultist Champion's autopistol can be replaced with 1 bolt pistol.
If this unit contains 15 or more models, you can select each of these wargear options a second time.

units.name: Accursed Cultists
units.description: This unit cannot contain more than 3 Torment models unless it also contains 10 Mutant models. If this unit contains 9 or more models, it has Power Rating 6. Every Mutant model is equipped with: blasphemous appendages. Every Torment model is equipped with: hideous mutations.

units.name: Chaos Terminator Squad
units.description: If this unit contains 6 or more models, it has Power Rating 18. Every model is equipped with: combi-bolter; accursed weapon.
wargearOptions: For every 5 models in this unit:
- One Chaos Terminator's combi-bolter can be replaced with one of the following: 1 reaper autocannon; 1 heavy flamer.
- One model's combi-bolter can be replaced with 1 combi-plasma.
- One model's combi-bolter can be replaced with 1 accursed weapon. Neither of this model's accursed weaposn can be replaced with 1 power fist or 1 chainfist (see below).
- Up to two models can each have their combi-bolter replaced with 1 combi-flamer.
- Up to two models can each have their combi-bolter replaced with 1 combi-melta.
- Up to three models can each have their accursed weapon replaced with 1 power fist.
- One model's accursed weapon can be replaced with 1 chainfist.

units.name: Noctolith Crown
units.description: A Noctolith Crown is equipped with: lashing warp energies.

units.name: Decimator
units.description: A Decimator is equipped with: 2 Decimator butcher cannons.

abilities.name: Let the Galaxy Burn, Daemon Engine

wargearOptions: Each of this model's Decimator butcher cannons can be replaced with one of the following: Decimator conversion beamer; soulburner petard; storm laser; 1 hellflamer and 1 Decimator claw.

units.name: Chaos Contemptor Dreadnought
units.description: A Chaos Contemptor Dreadnought is equipped with: 2 hellforged heavy plasma cannons.

abilities.name: Let the Galaxy Burn, Martial Legacy

wargearOptions: Each of this model's hellforged heavy plasma cannons can be replaced with one of the following: 1 conversion beam cannon; 1 hellforged kheres-pattern assault cannon; 1 multi-melta; 1 twin hellforged autocannon; 1 twin heavy bolter; 1 twin lascannon; 1 twin volkite culverin; 1 hellforged Dreadnought chainfist and 1 combi-bolter; 1 hellforged Dreadnought combat weapon and 1 combi-bolter.
Each of this model's combi-bolters can be replaced with one of the following: 1 graviton blaster; 1 heavy flamer; 1 hellforged plasma blaster.
This model can be equipped with 1 hellforged cyclone missile launcher.

units.name: Noise Marines
units.description: If this unit contains 6 or more models, it has Power Rating 12. Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; frag grenades; krak grenades.
wargearOptions: Any number of Noise Marines can each have their boltgun replaced with one of the following: 1 Astartes chainsword; 1 sonic blaster.
One Noise Marine's boltgun can be replaced with 1 blastmaster.
The Noise Champion's bolt pistol can be replaced with one of the following: 1 plasma pistol (maximum 1 per model); 1 weapon from the Melee Weapons list.
The Noise Champion's boltgun can be replaced with one of the following: 1 sonic blaster; 1 plasma pistol (maximum 1 per model); 1 weapon from the Melee Weapons list (pg 176).
The Noise Champion can be equipped with 1 doom siren.
One model can be equipped with 1 Icon of Slaanesh.

abilities.name: Let the Galaxy Burn, Malicious Volleys

armoury.name: Baleflamer
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

armoury.name: Defiler cannon
armoury.abilities: Blast.

armoury.name: Blastmaster
armoury.description: Before selecting targets, select one of the profiles below to make attacks with. Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack.

armoury.name: Combi-flamer
armoury.description: Before selecting targets, select one or both of the profiles below to make attacks with. If you select both, then each time an attack is made with this weapon this phase, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.

profile.name: - Flamer
profile.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

armoury.name: Combi-melta
armoury.description: Before selecting targets, select one or both of the profiles below to make attacks with. If you select both, then each time an attack is made with this weapon this phase, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.

profile.name: - Meltagun
profile.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D6+2.

armoury.name: Combi-plasma
armoury.description: Before selecting targets, select one or both of the profiles below to make attacks with (you can only select one of the plasma gun profiles). If you select two, then each time an attack is made with this weapon this phase, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.

profile.name: - Plasma gun (supercharge)
profile.abilities: If any unmodified hit rolls of 1 are made for attacks with this weapon profile, the bearer is destroyed after shooting with this weapon.

armoury.name: Daemongore cannon
armoury.abilities: Blast.

armoury.name: Demolisher siege cannon
armoury.abilities: Blast.

armoury.name: Helbrute plasma cannon
armoury.abilities: Blast. Each time an unmodified hit roll of 1 is made for an attack with this weapon, the bearer suffers 1 mortal wound after shooting with this weapon.

armoury.name: Helspear
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, if a hit is scored, draw a straight line between the closest point of this model's base (or hull) and that of the closest model in the target unit. Make one wound roll against the target unit, and each other unit this line passes over.

profile.name: - Supercharge

armoury.abilities: Sonic weapon. Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack.

armoury.name: Twin heavy flamer
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

armoury.name: Tyrant's Claw (shooting)
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

armoury.name: Xyclos Needler
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon against a unit (excluding VEHICLE or TITANIC units), an unmodified wound roll of 2+ is always successful.

armoury.name: Accursed weapon
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 1 additional attack with this weapon.

armoury.name: Astartes Chainsword
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 1 additional attack with this weapon.

armoury.name: Axe of dismemberment
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends.

armoury.name: Bladed limbs
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 4 additional attacks with this weapon.

armoury.name: Brutal assault weapon
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 1 additional attack with this weapon.

armoury.name: Chainfist
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll, and if that attack is allocated to a VEHICLE model, that attack has a Damage characteristic of 3.

armoury.name: Chirugeon
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 4 additional attacks with this weapon.

armoury.name: Daemon blade
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, on an unmodified wound roll of 6, the target suffers 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage.

armoury.name: Defiler scourge
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 3 additional attacks with this weapon.

armoury.name: Drach'nyen
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, on an unmodified wound roll of 6, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds in addition to any normal damage.

armoury.name: Great cleaver of Khorne
armoury.description: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, select one of the profiles below to make that attack with.

profile.name: - Slash
profile.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, make 3 hit rolls instead of 1.

armoury.name: Heavy chainaxe
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.

armoury.name: Helbrute Fist
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, if it is equipped with 2 Helbrute fists, it makes 1 additional attack with 1 of those weapons.

armoury.name: Helbrute Hammer
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.

armoury.name: Heldrake claws
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon is allocated to an AIRCRAFT model, that attack has a Damage characteristic of 4.

armoury.name: Herald's Talon
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, you can re-roll the wound roll.

armoury.name: Impaler chainglaive
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, if the bearer made a charge move this turn, add 1 to that attack's wound roll.

armoury.name: Lasher tendrils
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 6 additional attacks with this weapon.

armoury.name: Lightning claw
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 1 additional attack with this weapon. Each time an attack is made with this weapon, you can re-roll the wound roll.

armoury.name: Malefic talons
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 1 additional attack with this weapon.

armoury.name: Mechatendrils
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 4 additional attacks with this weapon.

armoury.name: Power fist
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.

armoury.name: Power scourge
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 3 additional attacks with this weapon.

armoury.name: Staff of possession
armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer fights, if one or more attacks made with this weapon were allocated to a PSYKER model, after the bearer has resolved all of its attacks, that PSYKER model's unit suffers Perils of the Warp.

armoury.name: Talon of Horus (melee)
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, make 2 hit rolls instead of 1.

armoury.name: Thunder hammer
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.

armoury.name: Tyrant's claw (melee)
armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, make 2 hit rolls instead of 1.

armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, you can re-roll the wound roll.

armoury.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

armoury.abilities: Each time the bearer shoots, if any unmodified hit rolls of 1 are made for attacks with this weapon, the bearer suffers 1 mortal wound after shooting with this weapon.
